üíª Usage Example

import { heicTo, isHeic } from "heic-to"

const file = fileInput.files[0]

// Check if the file is HEIC/HEIF
if (await isHeic(file)) {
  // Convert to JPEG
  const jpeg = await heicTo({
    blob: file,
    type: "image/jpeg",
    quality: 0.8
  })
  
  // Convert to PNG
  const png = await heicTo({
    blob: file,
    type: "image/png"
  })
}
